case.description: Settings page prompt search follow case

case_tip.message: Search following the case of the search terms
case_tip.description: Tooltip explaining search filtering using follow case

copycb.description: popup button for copying all URLs to clipboard

complex.description: Settings page prompt for complex search by terms with negation with hyphen

complex_tip.message: Use an advanced search where each term must match, and any preceded by a hyphen (-) are excluded
complex_tip.description: Tooltip explaining search filtering using complex search by terms with negation with hyphen

description.message: Collate all the links on the page into an easily accessible panel

displaySettings.message: How should items be displayed in the panel
displaySettings.description: Settings label for the area dedicated to display settings

failed.message: Could not get any links from tab, you may need to reload the tab
failed.description: Shows when the extension failed to get links from the page, possibly because the extension has just been installed and existing open pages are not ready

json.description: popup button for saving all page as json

justScript.message: Hide links that are just a script
justScript.description: Prompt for checkbox to hide links that are just scripts

lock.description: Text on button in panel that prevents changes to the list of links (i.e. currently unlocked)

lock_tip.message: Lock the panel to keep the same list of links even after you switch tabs
lock_tip.description: Tooltip text on button in panel that toggles locking

markdown.description: popup button for saving all pages to a list

maxlinks.message: Maximum number of links to parse
maxlinks.description: Setings prompt for max number links to parse

maxwarn.message: Increasing the number of max links could have performance dips. Recommended max: 5000
maxwarn.description: Warning that appears in settings if the max number of links is very high

noLinks.description: The page doesn't have any <a>, links or the current search filter doesn't return anything

openin.description: Settings option title for how to open links

optFollowerTab.description: Settings option to open in follower tab

optNewTab.description: Settings option to open in new tab

removeDupes.description: Label for settings option to hide links with duplicate URLs

samePage.description: Prompt for checkbox to hide links to current page

saveall.message:
Save pages to Downloads folder
(may take a long time)
saveall.description: popup button for saving all pages

saveall_tip.description: Tooltip for the button to save all pages

search.description: Prompt to filter the list of links

searchOptions.message: What to look through when searching
searchOptions.description: Settings page prompt for search options

sorted.description: Label for settings option to sort the items alphabetically

style.message: What CSS properties to style panel with
style.description: Settings page prompt for style options

text.description: Settings page prompt for search options (Text)

text_tip.message: Search in the link's visible text
text_tip.description: Tooltip explaining search filtering using search options (Text)

title.description: Settings page prompt for search options (Title)

title_tip.message: Search in the link's title attribute
title_tip.description: Tooltip explaining search filtering using search options (Title)

txt.description: popup button for saving all pages to a txt file

unlock.description: Text on button in panel that auto updates the latest set of links (i.e. currently locked)

url.description: Settings page prompt for search options (URL)

url_tip.description: Tooltip explaining search filtering using search options (URL)

urlsOnly.description: Label for settings option to only display urls in panel
